name: 业务扩展功能查询模板字典
description: 行动计划、活动分享、优惠券、点赞收藏记录、个人海报、语义关系等业务扩展功能相关表的查询模板

行动计划总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM action_plans

计划类型统计.sql: SELECT plan_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM action_plans GROUP BY plan_type ORDER BY count DESC
计划类型统计.description: 统计行动计划类型分布

计划状态统计.sql: SELECT plan_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM action_plans GROUP BY plan_status ORDER BY count DESC
计划状态统计.description: 统计行动计划状态分布

进行中计划.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM action_plans WHERE plan_status = 'in_progress'
进行中计划.description: 查询进行中的行动计划数量

活动分享总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_shares

分享平台统计.sql: SELECT share_platform, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_shares GROUP BY share_platform ORDER BY count DESC
分享平台统计.description: 统计活动分享平台分布

分享状态统计.sql: SELECT share_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_shares GROUP BY share_status ORDER BY count DESC
分享状态统计.description: 统计活动分享状态分布

本月活动分享.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_shares WHERE YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(NOW())
本月活动分享.description: 查询本月活动分享数量

优惠券总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM coupons

优惠券类型统计.sql: SELECT coupon_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM coupons GROUP BY coupon_type ORDER BY count DESC

优惠券状态统计.sql: SELECT coupon_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM coupons GROUP BY coupon_status ORDER BY count DESC

有效优惠券.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM coupons WHERE coupon_status = 'active' AND expiry_date > NOW()

点赞收藏记录总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM like_collect_records
点赞收藏记录总数.description: 查询点赞收藏记录总数
点赞收藏记录总数.response: 点赞收藏记录总数为{count}条

操作类型统计.sql: SELECT action_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM like_collect_records GROUP BY action_type ORDER BY count DESC
操作类型统计.description: 统计点赞收藏操作类型分布

目标类型统计.sql: SELECT target_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM like_collect_records GROUP BY target_type ORDER BY count DESC
目标类型统计.description: 统计点赞收藏目标类型分布

今日点赞收藏.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM like_collect_records WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()
今日点赞收藏.description: 查询今日点赞收藏数量

个人海报总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM personal_posters

海报模板统计.sql: SELECT template_id, COUNT(*) as count FROM personal_posters GROUP BY template_id ORDER BY count DESC
海报模板统计.description: 统计个人海报模板使用分布

海报状态统计.sql: SELECT poster_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM personal_posters GROUP BY poster_status ORDER BY count DESC
海报状态统计.description: 统计个人海报状态分布

语义关系总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM semantic_relationships

关系类型统计.sql: SELECT relationship_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM semantic_relationships GROUP BY relationship_type ORDER BY count DESC
关系类型统计.description: 统计语义关系类型分布

关系强度分析.sql: SELECT AVG(relationship_strength) as avg_strength, MIN(relationship_strength) as min_strength, MAX(relationship_strength) as max_strength FROM semantic_relationships WHERE relationship_strength IS NOT NULL
关系强度分析.description: 分析语义关系强度分布

业务扩展功能概览.sql: SELECT 'action_plans' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM action_plans UNION ALL SELECT 'activity_shares' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM activity_shares UNION ALL SELECT 'coupons' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM coupons UNION ALL SELECT 'like_collect_records' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM like_collect_records UNION ALL SELECT 'personal_posters' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM personal_posters UNION ALL SELECT 'semantic_relationships' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM semantic_relationships
业务扩展功能概览.description: 业务扩展功能数据总览
业务扩展功能概览.response: 业务扩展功能概览查询完成
